name: EquityIndex
label: equity index
definition: benchmark whose constituents are exclusively equity instruments

name: ReferenceIndex
definition: measure of change in the value of the contents of a basket over a given period of time
label: reference index
explanatoryNote: An index is a function based on a set of structured calculations with respect to a basket of credit risks, financial instruments or other indices over time. Analysis may be computed based on historical values, projected values, etc.

name: MarketCapitalization
label: market capitalization
definition: expression representing the perceived value of a company as determined by the stock market at a specific point in time

name: BasketOfCreditRisks
explanatoryNote: Note that the risk related to a given constituent may be calculated based on either (1) the overall credit risk associated with the entity or, (2) the combined risk associated with an entity and the specific instrument identified, or (3) risk associated with the instrument on its own. Criteria for constituents is based on sectors (emerging market, financial, sovereign, etc), spread range (investment grade, non-investment grade), or asset type (loan, bond, mortgage-backed, asset-backed), second criteria is based on maturity of protection (2,3,5,7,10 yrs). Markit manages over 2000 CDS indexes, for example.
label: basket of credit risks
definition: basket of instruments, legal entities, or a combination thereof collected for the purpose of analyzing risk

name: CapitalizationBasedWeightingFunction
definition: weighting function derived from the relative market capitalization (share price times the number of shares outstanding) of the companies tracked by an index
label: capitalization-based weighting function

name: CreditIndexConstituent
definition: constituent of a basket of credit risks
label: credit index constituent

name: CreditIndex
explanatoryNote: Such an index does not necessarily reference a static portfolio, as there may be provisions for replacing defaulted securities on which the index depends.
definition: reference index that is a function of credit events that change the value of an underlying portfolio
label: credit index

name: BasketOfEquities
definition: basket of securities whose constituents are listed shares
label: basket of equities

name: hasIndexName
label: has index name
definition: specifies a formal name for the index

name: hasMarketCapitalization
definition: indicates the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date
label: has market capitalization

name: hasOriginalNotionalValue
label: has original notional value
definition: indicates the notional amount represented by the index when it is first constituted

name: hasUpFrontFee
label: has up front fee
definition: specifies a fee payable by any party that wishes to participate in a contract based on the index after the start of its life

name: hasMarketCapitalizationValue
definition: indicates the monetary amount representing the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date
label: has market capitalization value

name: hasDebtRanking
definition: indicates the ranking of this debt instrument with respect to the credit index as a whole
label: has debt ranking

name: hasIndexValue
label: has index value
definition: specifies the value of a given index as of the release date

name: hasSpreadRange
definition: the range of credit spread for the constituents of the index
label: has spread range

name: hasPremium
definition: indicates a premium payable for a contract based on the index
label: has premium
